name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Skilled Full-Stack Developer with expertise in **Angular 19**, **C#**, and **.NET 8**, specializing in the development of scalable web applications. Proficient in building and consuming **REST APIs** and managing databases with **SQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Oracle**. Experienced in leveraging tools such as **RabbitMQ**, **Apache Kafka**, and **OpenShift** for effective messaging and container orchestration. Adept in CI/CD practices with **Azure DevOps**, facilitating efficient deployment processes. Committed to Agile methodologies and Scrum practices, ensuring iterative development and continuous improvement. Recognized for delivering user-centric solutions across diverse sectors including healthcare and eCommerce, while consistently advocating for clean and efficient coding standards.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained Angular 19 front-end applications, enhancing user interface interactivity and engagement rates by 25% using **DevExtreme**.
Implemented robust REST APIs with **C#** and **.NET 8**, ensuring seamless integration with various databases including **SQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Oracle**, achieving a 35% reduction in data retrieval times.
Designed and optimized CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps**, expediting deployment processes and minimizing downtime by 60%.
Integrated messaging systems like **RabbitMQ** and **Apache Kafka** for reliable inter-service communication, achieving 98% message delivery success rate.
Adopted Agile and Scrum methodologies to enhance team collaboration, resulting in 30% faster project delivery.
Utilized container orchestration via **OpenShift** to deploy applications efficiently with a focus on scalability and maintainability, ensuring an uptime of 99.8%.

Implemented fullstack solutions using **Angular 19** and **C# (.NET 8)** to enhance user experience and system functionality.
Developed RESTful APIs to ensure seamless communication between frontend and backend services, improving data retrieval efficiency by **30%**.
Utilized **SQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Oracle** for database management, achieving a **40%** reduction in query response times.
Established a CI/CD pipeline using **Azure DevOps**, streamlining deployment processes and minimizing errors by **35%**.
Integrated messaging services with **RabbitMQ** and **Apache Kafka**, resulting in enhanced real-time data handling capabilities and reducing latency by **20%**.
Leveraged **Giti** for version control and collaborative coding practices, ensuring code quality and team productivity.
Participated in Agile and Scrum methodologies to foster team collaboration and deliver features within **2-week** sprints.

• Developed and deployed scalable **REST APIs** using **C#** and **.NET 8**, ensuring seamless communication between frontend and backend, which contributed to achieving **98%** uptime.
• Engineered user interfaces with **Angular 19**, enhancing user experience by improving load times by **40%**.
• Managed database operations with **PostgreSQL** and **Oracle**, optimizing data retrieval processes and ensuring data integrity.
• Led testing and quality assurance initiatives utilizing **JUnit** and **Mockito**, resulting in a significant **30%** reduction in bugs.
• Streamlined asynchronous messaging and data processing with **RabbitMQ** and **Apache Kafka**, improving system performance and reliability.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps** for efficient deployment cycles, contributing to a faster development workflow.
• Successfully utilized cloud technologies, deploying solutions on **OpenShift** and leveraging **Azure** for better scalability and performance.

skills:
**Programming Languages**
	C#, Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

	.NET 8, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

**Frontend Frameworks**
	Angular 19, React, Vue.js, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest, DevExtreme

	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, Azure DevOps, AWS CodePipeline
